PHRASE.LANG: Look like Winston Nelson Drake Smith who runs the same butchers in Little Riddle that’s been in the family pretty much since the village first existed. [#Legal]
Ressemble fort à Winston Nelson Drake Smith qui gère la même boucherie familiale à Little Riddle depuis la fondation du village. [#Legal]
Sieh aus wie Winston Nelson Drake Smith, der die Metzgerei in Little Riddle führt, die seit der Gründung des Dorfes in Familienhand liegt. [#Legal]
Assumi l’aspetto di Winston Nelson Drake Smith che gestisce la macelleria di famiglia che è a Little Riddle fin dalla fondazione del villaggio. [#Legal]
Siéntete como Winston Nelson Drake Smith que lleva la carnicería que su familia ha tenido en Little Riddle prácticamente desde que el pueblo existe. [#Legal]
Look like Winston Nelson Drake Smith who runs the same butchers in Little Riddle that’s been in the family pretty much since the village first existed. [#Legal]
